Last timepoint to include in analysis.
An integer, or Stop or None to use the last possible timepoint.

The TR at which images were acquired.
A number, or None if the TR is to be read from the NifTI header.

Interpolate voxel time courses so they are sampled at the same time points.
A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

Acquisition strategy for acquiring image slices.
A list that can contain one of the following values: ‘Use NIFTI Header’,’alt+z’, ‘alt+z2’, ‘alt-z’, ‘alt-z2’, ‘seq+z’, ‘seq-z’
